posts.title: Statistical Inference Note
posts.text: This lecture note is based on Rice STAT 532: Foundations of Statistical Inference I and Rice STAT 533: Foundations of Statistical Inference II. All the lecture notes will provide an advanced introduction to the mathematical theory of statistics, including comprehensive measure-theoretic probability, common families of distributions, statistical decision theory, statistics, and estimation. Chapter 1: Measure Space File This chapter discusses measures and their definition, construction of functions and induced measures, integration and differentiation, and conditional expectation/distributions. Chapter 2: Probability Measures on Euclidean Spaces File This chapter discusses the detailed properties of probability models on Euclidean spaces, moment inequalities, generating functions, distribution families, and order statistics.

posts.title: Inference on Selected Subgroups in Clinical Trials
posts.text: This note is based on the Inference on Selected Subgroups in Clinical Trials (Guo and He, 2020)
